original_title: My Little Pony Friendship is Magic: It's An Applejack Hoedown
overview: Get ready for some good ol' fashion country fun as Applejack and the gang have a hootenanny of a time all across Equestria. Featuring 4 'Applejack' episodes from My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic.
title: My Little Pony Friendship is Magic: It's An Applejack Hoedown
